#include <iostream>

int bottle(int num)
{

    if (num <= 1)
        return 0;

    else if (num == 2)
        return 1;
	// å½“å‰ç“¶ç›–å¯ä»¥æ¢çš„æ±½æ°´æ•°
    int cnt = num / 3;
    // ç“¶ç›–å‰©ä½™ï¼šnum = num - 3 * cnt + cnt
    num -= 2 * cnt;
    return cnt + bottle(num);
}

int main()
{
    int num;
    while (cin >> num)
    {
        if (num == 0)
            return 0;
        int cnt = bottle(num);
        cout << cnt << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    string a, b;
    cin >> a >> b;
    // å°†aè®¾ä¸ºè¾ƒçŸ­ä¸²
    if (a.size() > b.size())
        swap(a, b);
    int m = a.size();
    int n = b.size();
    vector<vector<int>> dp(m + 1, vector<int>(n + 1, 0));
    int start = 0;
    int len = 0;

    for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i)
    {
        for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j)
        {
            if (a[i - 1] == b[j - 1])
            {
                dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j - 1] + 1;
                if (dp[i][j] > len)
                {
                    len = dp[i][j];
                    start = i - len;
                }
            }
        }
    }

    cout << a.substr(start, len) << endl;
    return 0;
}

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int T;
    cin >> T;
    while (T--)
    {
        int n, k;
        cin >> n >> k;
        vector<int> ans(2 * n);
        for (int i = 0; i < ans.size(); ++i)
            cin >> ans[i];
        // æ´—kæ¬¡ç‰Œ
        while (k--)
        {
            // åˆå§‹æ¡ä»¶
            vector<int> tmp(ans.begin(), ans.end());
            // æ´—ç‰Œ
            for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
            {
                ans[2 * i] = tmp[i];
                ans[2 * i + 1] = tmp[i + n];
            }
        }
        cout << ans[0];
        for (int i = 1; i < ans.size(); ++i)
            cout << " " << ans[i];
        cout << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

void Change(char mod, int& pos, int& top, int& bottom, int n)
{
    // æ ¹æ®æŒ‡ä»¤è¿›è¡ŒåŠ å‡
    if (mod == 'D')
        pos += 1;
    else
        pos -= 1;
	// å•ç‹¬å¤„ç†æœ€é¡¶ç«¯ä½ç½®å‘ä¸Šç¿»å’Œæœ€ä½ç«¯ä½ç½®å‘ä¸‹ç¿»çš„æƒ…å†µ
    if (pos == 0)
    {
        pos = n;
        bottom = n;
        top = bottom - 3;
    }
    else if (pos == n + 1)
    {
        pos = 1;
        top = 1;
        bottom = top + 3;
    }
    else
    {
        // å½“æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„æ­Œæ›²å·²ç»è¶…å‡ºå±å¹•æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„æ­Œæ›²èŒƒå›´æ—¶ï¼Œæ›´æ”¹æ­Œæ›²çš„èŒƒå›´
        if (pos == bottom + 1)
        {
            top++;
            bottom++;
        }
        else if (pos == top - 1)
        {
            top--;
            bottom--;
        }
        // å…¶ä½™æƒ…å†µä¸ç”¨æ›´æ”¹æ­Œæ›²èŒƒå›´ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸åšå¤„ç†
    }
}

int main()
{
    int n;
    string s;
    cin >> n >> s;
	
    // å°äºç­‰äºå››é¦–æ­Œæ—¶å•ç‹¬å¤„ç†
    if (n <= 4)
    {        
        int pos = 1;// å½“å‰è¡Œçš„æ­Œæ›²ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¸º1
        int top = 1;// ä¸€é¡µæ›²å•çš„é¡¶éƒ¨
        // æ­¤æ—¶æœ€å¤šæ˜¾ç¤ºné¦–æ­Œ
        int bottom = n;// ä¸€é¡µæ›²å•çš„åº•éƒ¨
        for (auto& ch : s)
        {
            if (ch == 'D')
                pos++;
            else
                pos--;
			// å•ç‹¬å¤„ç†æœ€é¡¶ç«¯ä½ç½®å‘ä¸Šç¿»å’Œæœ€ä½ç«¯ä½ç½®å‘ä¸‹ç¿»çš„æƒ…å†µ
            if (pos == 0)
                pos = n;
            else if (pos == n + 1)
                pos = 1;
            // ä¸ç”¨å¤„ç†ç¿»é¡µæ­Œæ›²æ˜¾ç¤ºèŒƒå›´
        }
        for (int i = top; i <= bottom; ++i)
            cout << i << " ";
        cout << endl << pos;
    }
    else
    {
        int pos = 1;// å½“å‰è¡Œçš„æ­Œæ›²ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¸º1
        int top = 1;// ä¸€é¡µæ›²å•çš„é¡¶éƒ¨ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¸º1
        int bottom = 4;// ä¸€é¡µæ›²å•çš„åº•éƒ¨ï¼Œn>4æ—¶ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¸º4

        for (auto& ch : s)
        {
            // å¤„ç†å‘½ä»¤
            Change(ch, pos, top, bottom, n);
        }
        for (int i = top; i <= bottom; ++i)
        {
            cout << i << " ";
        }
        cout << endl << pos;
    }

class Solution {
public:
    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {
        if (word1.empty() || word2.empty())
            return max(word1.size(), word2.size());

        int len1 = word1.size();
        int len2 = word2.size();
        vector<vector<int>> ret(len1 + 1, vector<int>(len2 + 1, 0));

        // åˆå§‹åŒ–
        // j == 0 æ—¶
        for (int i = 0; i <= len1; ++i)
            ret[i][0] = i;
        // i == 0 æ—¶
        for (int i = 0; i <= len2; ++i)
            ret[0][i] = i;

        for (int i = 1; i <= len1; ++i)
        {
            for (int j = 1; j <= len2; ++j)
            {
                // å…ˆé€‰æ‹©åˆ é™¤ or æ’å…¥
                ret[i][j] = min(ret[i - 1][j] + 1, ret[i][j - 1] + 1);
				
                // åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦è¦æ›¿æ¢ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¦æ›¿æ¢ï¼Œæ“ä½œæ•° +1 ï¼Œåä¹‹ä¸å˜
                // word1çš„ç¬¬ i ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ï¼Œå¯¹åº”ç´¢å¼•ä¸ºi - 1ï¼Œword2åŒç†
                if (word1[i - 1] == word2[j - 1])
                    ret[i][j] = min(ret[i - 1][j - 1], ret[i][j]);
                else
                    ret[i][j] = min(ret[i - 1][j - 1] + 1, ret[i][j]);
            }
        }

        return ret[len1][len2];
    }
};

class Solution {
public:
    int minPathSum(vector<vector<int> >& grid) {
        int m = grid.size();
        int n = grid[0].size();
		
        //åˆå§‹åŒ–
        for (int i = 1; i < m; i++)
            grid[i][0] = grid[i - 1][0] + grid[i][0];

        for (int i = 1; i < n; i++)
            grid[0][i] = grid[0][i - 1] + grid[0][i];
		
        // è½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹
        for (int i = 1; i < m; i++)
        {
            for (int j = 1; j < n; j++)
                grid[i][j] = min(grid[i - 1][j], grid[i][j - 1]) + grid[i][j];
        }

        return grid[m - 1][n - 1];
    }
};

class Bonus {
public:
    int getMost(vector<vector<int> > board) {
        vector<vector<int>> dp(board.size(), vector<int>(board[0].size()));
        dp[0][0] = board[0][0];
        for (int i = 1; i < board.size(); ++i)
            dp[i][0] = board[i][0] + dp[i - 1][0];
        for (int j = 1; j < board[0].size(); ++j)
            dp[0][j] = board[0][j] + dp[0][j - 1];

        for (int i = 1; i < board.size(); ++i)
        {
            for (int j = 1; j < board[0].size(); ++j)
            {
                dp[i][j] = max(dp[i - 1][j], dp[i][j - 1]) + board[i][j];
            }
        }
        return dp[board.size() - 1][board[0].size() - 1];
    }
};

        int newj = j + des[k][1];
		// æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦è¶Šç•Œ
        if (newi < 0 || newj < 0 || newi >= row || newj >= col)
            continue;
        // å½“éå†ç‚¹å¯ä»¥èµ°
        if (v[newi][newj] == 0)
            Dfs(v, vs, row, col, newi, newj, flag);
        // æ‰¾åˆ°è·¯å¾„ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›
        if (flag == 1)
            return;
    }
    // éå†å®Œä»æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°è·¯ï¼Œè¯´æ˜æ­¤è·¯ä¸é€šï¼Œå°†å…¶æ ‡è®°æ¢å¤
    v[i][j] = 0;
    // èˆå»è·¯å¾„ä¸­çš„æ­¤ç‚¹
    vs.pop_back();
}

int main()
{
    int m, n;
    cin >> m >> n;
    vector<vector<int>> v(m, vector<int>(n));
    vector<string> vs;
    for (int i = 0; i < v.size(); ++i)
    {
        for (int j = 0; j < v[0].size(); ++j)
        {
            cin >> v[i][j];
        }
    }
    int flag = 0;
    Dfs(v, vs, v.size(), v[0].size(), 0, 0, flag);
    for (auto& s : vs)
        cout << s << endl;
    return 0;
}
